intro: Caldasia argentea, commonly known as silver caldasia, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. The plant is characterized by its striking silver-green foliage and showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that range from white to pink. It thrives in warm, humid environments and requires well-drained soil.
